title: 3 and Out - Justin Fields Upside, Wentz Decline + Week 6 Preview and 3 for the $$ Picks
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Justin Fields Upside, Wentz Decline + Week 6 Preview and 3 for the $$ Picks
description:
John explains why he was impressed by Justin Fields' performance in a rough loss to the Commanders, how the ugly war between Dan Snyder and the NFL could play out, and if Carson Wentz is a lost cause. He also previews the top week 6 games,  hits on the top headlines around the league, and runs 3 Week 6 NFL games by Action Network sharp Stuckey to see if there's professional agreement or disagreement on this week’s picks! 

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #volume #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
